text: The January Man is a 1989 comedy-thriller movie. It is about a former New York City police detective lured back into his job when a serial killer terrorizes the city. Susan Sarandon plays Christine. Harvey Keitel plays Frank. Mary Elizabeth Mastrantonio plays Bernadette. Danny Aiello plays Vincent. Kevin Kline plays Nick. The movie received negative review from critics. Category:American thriller movies Category:American comedy movies Category:1989 comedy movies Category:1989 thriller movies Category:Movies directed by Pat O'Connor Category:Movies set in New York City
title: The January Man
